/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

On either side of the street, there are trees standing tall, their leaves a vibrant green. They line the street, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city.

The street itself is busy with several cars and a bus in motion. The cars vary in color, with hues of white, black, and red adding a splash of color to the scene. The bus, with its distinctive shape and size, stands out amidst the smaller vehicles.

The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the movement and energy of the city in a single frame. It's a blend of nature, architecture, and human activity, all under the vast blue sky.
